snippet: The oldest Jewish document of the New World will be returned to Mexico in March, the Mexican consulate in New York said on Friday, more than seven decades after it disappeared....

headline.main: All 36 Victims of Ghost Ship Fire Died From Smoke Inhalation
headline.print_headline: All 36 Victims of Ghost Ship Fire Died From Smoke Inhalation

lead_paragraph: The oldest Jewish document of the New World will be returned to Mexico in March, the Mexican consulate in New York said on Friday, more than seven decades after it disappeared.
